sense.def:
To punch someone
pomeni nekoga močno udariti s pestjo.

seg.quote: Boylan punched him hard on the nose.
I was punched in the stomach.
...aiming a slow punch at my jaw.

sense.def:
A punch
je orodje, s katerim delamo luknje.

seg.quote: He made a small hole in the belt with a leather punch.

sense.def:
To punch holes in something
pomeni potiskati oster predmet v nekaj in tako delati luknje.

seg.quote: Edward was punching holes in a can.

sense.def:
Punch
je pijača, navadno narejena iz vina ali žgane pijače; pomešana je s sladkorjem, sadjem in začimbami.
